code: import React,{Component}from'react';import{CartContext}from'../store/shopping-cart-context';import CartItem from'./CartItem';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class Cart extends Component{render(){const{items}=this.context;if(items.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Your cart is empty"});}const totalPrice=items.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.price.amount*item.quantity,0);const totalQuantity=items.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.quantity,0);const currency=items[0].price.currency.symbol;let title='My Bag';if(totalQuantity===1){title+=', 1 item';}else if(totalQuantity>1){title+=", ".concat(totalQuantity," items");}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItem,{item:item},item.id+JSON.stringify(item.selectedAttributes))),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{id:"cart-total-price","data-testid":"cart-total",children:["Cart Total: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[currency,totalPrice.toFixed(2)]})]})]});}}Cart.contextType=CartContext;export default Cart;
